fields.description:
h3.Problem
Trying to play a video using Titanium.Media.createVideoPlayer plays just 3 seconds and pop up appears with "Sorry The application [applicationname] (process [applicationname] hast stopped unexpectedly. Please try again. Force close".

h3.Reproducible Steps
1. Open the small project that I have attached
fields.summary: Android: KindleFire - createVideoPlayer causes the alert
